answers.answer: I highly recommend seeing an eye doctor (ophthalmologist), specifically a retinal specialist (if available to you).Diabetes can cause many problems, including retinal probelsm and macular problems etc.You can discuss all of this with the eye doctor.

title: what kind of eye problems diabetes passents cane face
